//onboading Welcome to the Tourslate app! Easy use translate feature! There is a History feature! Discover a new way to understand every regional language with the Tourslate app. Start now increasing your productivity with our features! Tourslate App makes it easy for you to translate every regional language from western Indonesia to eastern Indonesia with just 1 click! This feature to make it easier for us to find out what we have translated, lets use Tourslate!
